creditline: Lent by Gary and Janet Christenson
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: several figures in boat on rapidly flowing river; matted
text: This dynamic image illustrates a rafting party on the Hozu River in Kyoto. The banks for the river are planted in maple and cherry trees, making the exciting trip down stream especially popular in spring and autumn. This image originally was produced as a postcard.
title: Hozu River Rafting
